goals__remit: Serving the interests of the members of FAI, which are the cooperatives Royal FloraHolland and Plantion and as such serving the interests of the members of Royal FloraHolland and Plantion which are Dutch and worldwide based ornamental producers. Supporting the marketing of ornamental products.
